pullrequest.title: Add support for OpenStack via the AWS layer

content.raw:
I forgot to mention that you'll need to create a new OpenStack flavor (instance type in EC2). The Ubuntu images I'm using require at least 2GB of root disk, but t1.micro only has 1GB and the other flavors have too much memory.

Please follow these steps to create the ```cloudsim-basic``` flavor:

```shell
$ vagrant ssh

# Now you're inside the Vagrant VM

$ cd devstack
$ . openrc admin
$ nova flavor-create cloudsim-basic auto 512 2 1
$ logout

# Now you're back on the host machine
```
